Message:
At this rate, the village shall
be completely submerged...!
What... What should I do...?!

“Were you not the one who
yearned for such power?”

B-But...I never intended
for this to happen...!
I just wanted to return
the village back to normal...
I never thought things would
turn out like this...!

“This is what your
wish has wrought.”
My wish...
made everyone...!
I knew I would fail...

If it were someone besides me,
this never would have happened...

“Then, why don’t I shoulder
everything for you?
Your sins, your pain...

All you need to do is sleep.
Leave everything to me...”

“Yes... I shall give all of myself
to you, little fairy.

That is for the best...
No matter how I may try to atone,
I shall surely fail, just like always...”

But, that very moment,
my harp rang out.

This sound... I remember!
This was the sound I made
the first time I ever
played the harp...

I...do not want to throw
anything away...!
Not my memories,
nor my soul...

I do not want to forget
any of the feelings
music has given me!

If my sins, my dreams,
and everything else are
all born from my heart,

I shall shoulder them all.
If that is what my heart is,
I shall accept everything
that I am...!

“So, you choose to
undergo this trial?

No matter.
My true target
lies elsewhere...”

Then...I felt something...
leave my body.
